paragraphs.text:
%md

### Spark SQL

- with Spark SQL you can run SQL queries against views or tables organized into databases. 
- You also can use system functions or define user functions and analyze query plans in order to optimize their workloads. 
- This integrates directly into the DataFrame and Dataset API
- You can choose to express some of your data manipulations in SQL and others in DataFrames and they will compile to the same underlying code.
- Spark implements a subset of ANSI SQL:2003. 
- This SQL standard is one that is available in the majority of SQL databases and this support means that Spark successfully runs the popular benchmark TPC-DS
